problem.p: My answer to part 1 is justified because:

choicegroup.choice: a. Mechanical energy is conserved throughout.
b. Mechanical energy is only conserved when the block is on the slide.
c. It is necessary to find the speed of the block as it is leaving the slide.
d. There is a collision when the block hits the water.
e. Statements b, c and d are all needed to explain the decomposition.
